title: Probabilistic reconciliation
description: Here we implement and tests two recent methods on probabilistic reconciliation of hierarchical time series forecasts

title: Diffusion models I
description: In this case study we cover the basics of diffusion probabilistic models. The notebook uses Distrax and Haiku for probabilistic inference

title: Normalizing flows for variational inference
description: This case study implements an inverse autoregressive flow for variational inference of parameters. The notebook uses Distrax and Haiku for probabilistic inference
